name: 何嘉浚
objective:
河溪生態工法導論包含河岸保護及復育，利用植生與土壤工程的結構系統保護湖泊、河口及河川，使其孼受侵蝕。因此本課程授課內容將包含測量、逕流推估、水力學、基礎土壤工程、水工構造物、植草的水道及出口、蝕溝處裡、分水工、河川及濕地復育、施工材料及以土壤工程保護邊坡並降低沖蝕量。
Stream ecological engineering method consists of restoring and protecting banks of streams, lakes, estuaries, and excavated channels against scour and erosion by using vegetative plantings, soilengineering, and structural systems. The content of this course includes engineering surveys, estimating runoff, hydraulics, elementary soils engineering, structure, grassed waterways and outlets, gully treatment, diversions, stream and wetland restorations, construction and construction materials, and soil bioengineering for upland slope protection and erosion reduction.
schedule:
第一週：課程簡介及課程大綱介紹 (Introduction)
第二週：生態工法的定義、發展與範疇(Basic Concepts and Principles of Ecological Engineering)
第三週：河溪生態系統 (River Ecosystem)
第四週：河川與溪流復育(一) (River and Stream Restoration I)
第五週：河川與溪流復育(二) (River and Stream Restoration II)
第六週：植生與景觀 (Vegetation and Landscape)
第七週：清明節暨春假
第八週：濕地生態工法 (Constructed Wetland)
第九週：人工濕地生態現地參觀 (Field Trip in Wetland)
第十週：水文水理分析 (一) (Hydrology and Hydraulic Analysis I)
第十一週：水文水理分析 (二) (Hydrology and Hydraulic Analysis II)
第十二週：河岸穩定生態工法 (一) (Ecological Engineering Method on Riverbank Stability I)
第十三週：河岸穩定生態工法 (二) (Ecological Engineering Method on Riverbank Stability II)
第十四週：河岸穩定生態工法 (三) (Ecological Engineering Method on Riverbank Stability II)
第十五週：河溪生態工法現地參觀 (Field Trip in Stream Ecological Engineering)
第十六週：河岸生態工法施工準則 (一) (Construction Method for Riverbank Ecological Engineering I)
第十七週：河岸生態工法施工準則 (二) (Construction Method for Riverbank Ecological Engineering II)
第十八週：期末報告 (Final Report)
scorePolicy:
1.平常出席及作業成績/ Attendance and Assignments (40%) 
2.報告/ Report (40%)
3.期末檢討/ Final review  (20%)

4.「生態工法技術參考手冊」，林鎮洋等人，明文書局，2004
5.Harper, D.M. and A.J.D. Ferguson, 1995, The ecological basis for river management. John Wiley & Sons., New York, NY, 614 pp.
